summary:
After analyzing the website https://emploi.cnrs.fr/Offres.aspx, hereâ€™s what information can be scraped: 
Job titles
Research units/laboratories
Work locations
Employment types (CDI, CDD, etc.)
Publication dates
Geographic regions
Keywords related to job functions

content_zones.description: Primary container displaying all job postings in tabular format with sortable columns
Each row represents a single job posting with multiple data fields

structural_characteristics: Tabular data structure with sortable headers
Standardized data fields across all entries
Filter options by geographic region and employment type
scraping_challenges: Dynamic content loading may require JavaScript execution
Some fields contain concatenated information requiring parsing
Potential rate limiting or access restrictions
Content may be loaded asynchronously through AJAX calls
